quick_answer.text: 4 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~187 kcal and ~35 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

faqs.q: How many calories are in 4 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 187 kcal for 4 oz (113 g) skinless, cooked chicken breast.

faqs.q: How much protein in 4 oz chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw would be higher due to water loss during cooking.

faqs.q: What affects calories in chicken breast the most?
faqs.a: Skin inclusion, added oils, breading, or sauces significantly increase calories.

faqs.q: Per 100 g, how many calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Roughly 165 kcal, 31 g protein, 3.6 g fat, 0 g carbs per 100 g cooked skinless.
